effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 547,060 damage to your primary target and 107,799 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Geargrinder's Spare Keys

spells.description: Use: Launch a Geargrinder trike to its final blaze of glory, exploding upon impacting the first enemy in its path to deal 2 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: I'm gonna step on the gas!

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,890 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 181 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
